name: Right in the wood
description:
My game for Ludum Dare #33, 2 button controls !

/!\ See compo entry and vote here : compo entry

Controls :
- Use only right and up arrow key to play !
Special keys :
- M to mute/unmute music
- R to restart a level
- Escape to quit

I really enjoyed create this game, and more than that, playing it and try to beat my own records ! So I hope you will have fun trying it and see you next LD !
